Package in.fssa.evotingsystem.service

Class ElectionService

java.lang.Object
in.fssa.evotingsystem.service.ElectionService
public class ElectionService extends Object
Service class that provides methods to interact with election-related operations.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The updated ElectionDAO object.
      Throws:
